params.name: out
params.description: Whether to capture stdout or not.

params.name: err
params.description: Whether to capture stderr or not.

params.name: replay
params.description: Whether to replay or not.By default each captured stream gets replayed back on contexts exit, so that one can see what the test wasdoing. If this is a not wanted behavior and the captured data shouldnt be replayed, pass replay=False todisable this feature.
